title: Ottawa funds COVID-19 research project that is collaborating with Wuhan virus lab - The Globe and Mail
description: Ottawa funds COVID-19 research project that is collaborating with Wuhan virus lab The Globe and Mail The Wuhan disease lab is the focus of suspicion and conspiracy theories about COVID-19's origins National Post Truth Tracker: There's no scientific proof that…
content: A spokesman for federal Health Minister Patty Hadju, seen here on March 19, 2020, said all research projects that receive funding from the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, a federal funding agency, undergo 'rigorous peer review' by 'expert scientists i… [+7164 chars]
